content: We don't expect to have to with some, I don't think we have a capital raising requirement for Nemaska period at any point during the project, we won't see a big Livent kind of market corporate capital to fund Nemaska, it's going to come out with existing cash flow, or more importantly, there's other sources of financing, I mean Nemaska standalone still, it'll sort its own financing out as an IQ as the shareholders will dictate whether what their financing looks like, it's not just going to be every dollar that gets provided $0.50, that they need gets 50% IQ.
